content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Making reservations for a wine tasting and tour at both wineries is a great idea. It'll give you a chance to relax and enjoy the experience without worrying about availability.

Remember to arrive a few minutes early to each winery to allow time for check-in and to get settled. Be sure to take your time, ask questions, and soak up the beautiful Hill Country scenery.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you have a fantastic time exploring the Hill Country, enjoying the scenic drive, and savoring some amazing Texas wines!

Cheers to a wonderful day trip!
